tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.11
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayT True isArrayTMIN True isArrayTMAX True isArrayP True isArraySWC False output_data_SMT $output_data_SMT output_data_SMP $output_data_SMP output_data_LGS $output_data_LGS output_data_FIRST $output_data_FIRST output_data_LAST $output_data_LAST output_data_TLH $output_data_TLH name SAGA.climate_tools.11 T $T TMIN $TMIN TMAX $TMAX P $P SWC $SWC SWC_DEFAULT $SWC_DEFAULT SWC_SURFACE $SWC_SURFACE SW1_RESIST $SW1_RESIST LAT_DEF $LAT_DEF DT_MIN $DT_MIN SW_MIN $SW_MIN LGS_MIN $LGS_MIN SMT_MIN $SMT_MIN TLH_MAX_DIFF $TLH_MAX_DIFF prefer $prefer response $response outputType_SMT $OutputSection_SMT.outputType_SMT transmissionMode_SMT $OutputSection_SMT.transmissionMode_SMT outputType_SMP $OutputSection_SMP.outputType_SMP transmissionMode_SMP $OutputSection_SMP.transmissionMode_SMP outputType_LGS $OutputSection_LGS.outputType_LGS transmissionMode_LGS $OutputSection_LGS.transmissionMode_LGS outputType_FIRST $OutputSection_FIRST.outputType_FIRST transmissionMode_FIRST $OutputSection_FIRST.transmissionMode_FIRST outputType_LAST $OutputSection_LAST.outputType_LAST transmissionMode_LAST $OutputSection_LAST.transmissionMode_LAST outputType_TLH $OutputSection_TLH.outputType_TLH transmissionMode_TLH $OutputSection_TLH.transmissionMode_TLH

param.name: T
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Mean Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: TMIN
param.label: Minimum Temperature
param.help: Minimum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: TMAX
param.label: Maximum Temperature
param.help: Maximum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: P
param.label: Precipitation
param.help: Precipitation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: SWC
param.label: Soil Water Capacity of Profile
param.help: Total soil water capacity (mm H2O). The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-aaigrid, x-ogc-envi, tiff

param.name: SWC_DEFAULT
param.label: Default
param.help: default value if no grid has been selected

param.name: SWC_SURFACE
param.label: Top Soil Water Capacity
param.help: Top Soil Water Capacity

param.name: SW1_RESIST
param.label: Transpiration Resistance
param.help: Transpiration Resistance

param.name: LAT_DEF
param.label: Default Latitude
param.help: Default Latitude

param.name: DT_MIN
param.label: Threshold Temperature
param.help: Threshold temperature (C) that constrains the growing season.

param.name: SW_MIN
param.label: Minimum Soil Water Content (Percent)
param.help: Minimum Soil Water Content (Percent)

param.name: LGS_MIN
param.label: Minimum Length
param.help: Minimum length (days) of the growing season.

param.name: SMT_MIN
param.label: Minimum Mean Temperature
param.help: Minimum mean temperature (C) for all days of the growing season.

param.name: TLH_MAX_DIFF
param.label: Maximum Tree Line Height Difference
param.help: Maximum Tree Line Height Difference

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_SMT
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_SMT
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Mean temperature of the growing season.

section.name: OutputSection_SMP
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_SMP
param.label: Precipitation Sum
param.help: Precipitation sum of the growing season.

section.name: OutputSection_LGS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_LGS
param.label: Length
param.help: Number of days of the growing season.

section.name: OutputSection_FIRST
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_FIRST
param.label: First Growing Day
param.help: First growing day of the year (1-365).

section.name: OutputSection_LAST
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_LAST
param.label: Last Growing Day
param.help: Last degree day of the year (1-365).

section.name: OutputSection_TLH
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value

param.name: outputType_TLH
param.label: Tree Line Height
param.help: Estimated relative tree line height.

tool.help: The 'Tree Growth Season' tool estimates the potential number of days suitable for tree growth as well as the average temperature for these days. The estimation needs monthly data of mean, minimum, and maximum temperature and precipitation. Internally a soil water balance model is run on a daily basis. Using the given thresholds a relative tree line height can optionally be estimated.
